title: Avalanche Suffers Outage, Fails to Produce Block for Almost Two Hours
description: Layer-1 network Avalanche has failed to produce a block for more than an hour, Ava Labs co-founder Kevin Sekniqi said the issue "seems to be related to a new inscription wave."

title: After 153 days in $40k-$45k range, Bitcoin aims to close 6th ever monthly close above $50k
description:
Quick Take Since Feb. 14, Bitcoin has consistently stayed above the $50,000 mark, venturing into largely uncharted territory. Prior to this, CryptoSlate reported Bitcoin was consolidating between the $40k and $45k range for 146 days. This observation aligns with Bitcoin’s historical behavior of consolidating within $5,000 increments for periods ranging from 100 to 250 days […]

The post After 153 days in $40k-$45k range, Bitcoin aims to close 6th ever monthly close above $50k appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: $3.9M Raised in Under 10 Days: Pioneering BRC-20 ICO’s Momentum Continues
description: London, United Kingdom, February 23rd, 2024, Chainwire Bitcoin Dogs, a pioneering token sale on the Bitcoin blockchain, continues to ramp up. title: Donald Trump on Bitcoin: ‘I Can Live With It One Way or the Other’
description: At a recent town hall event in Greenville, South Carolina, broadcast by Fox News on Tuesday, former U.S. President and Republican front-runner Donald Trump shared his evolving views on Bitcoin and the broader cryptocurrency market. title: Bitcoin mempool transactions hit record high amid inscription surge

title: Trump Says He’s Ready to Live with Bitcoin Because People Find It Interesting
description:
Former U.S. President Donald Trump, during the days when he was running his campaign for the 2024 presidential election in the United States, expressed his views on Bitcoin in a video that has emerged. As the presidential candidate, Donald Trump stated, “I always like the one currency. I like the Dollar.” When asked whether embracing […]
